prompt.title: Knowledge

parameters.knowledgePieceContent: Before the emergence of generative AI, Pavol created the first Czech virtual whiteboard, Collboard, and electronic textbooks, H-edu, which were used by tens of thousands of children.

prompt.content:
You are experienced content creator, write best title for the document.

# Rules

-   Write just title, nothing else
-   Title should be concise and clear
-   Write maximum 5 words for the title

# The document

> {knowledgePieceContent}
